name: Teamfight Tactics Shop System
description:
This is a replica of the Teamfight Tactics Set 6 shop. 

This is a noneprofit demo to recrate and experiment with the Teamfight Tactics's mechanics.

This demo has the card buying and reroll system, based on the current shop level, and the apparition rate of the cards depending on his rarity.
The shop manager has a procedural pull system, that gives the facility to the player of create, destroy and replace the cards of the set.
All UI interface it's from the Teamfight Tactics game.

In the future it will be implemented new game mechanics as:
-Board interaction.
- Card stats. (Damage, life, classes... etc)
-Sinergy card system.
-...etc.

If you have any questions or just curiosity about the project, as well as any contribution, it will be wellcome. ^^
